data.title: When did Amelia Earhart marry george putman?
data.meta_description: No she wrote him a note saying I will marry you but keep my last name
data.text:
No she wrote him a note saying I will marry you but keep my last name

Did Amelia Earhart get engaged with Samuel Chapman?

She did get ingaged to Samuel Chapman who was boadering with her parents when she met him. But she didn't marry him, in the end she married George

Was Amelia Earhart successful?

Amelia Earhart's family had some problems connected with alcoholism of her father, that lead the family to poverty and caused many obstacles for Amelia Earhart's plans and dreams; particularly she was forced, twice, to interrupt her education in Columbia University. Also, there were many people who were against her fame because she was a woman.

What qualification did George Putnam have to manage Earhart's career?

I think his qualification was he we a determined person who strives at what he does and how he does it.
